kpi_info.title: CELL_FACH TO PCH ATTEMPTS
kpi_info.use: The number of attempted state transitions from Cell_FACH to Cell_PCH or URA_PCH. UPDATED: When the UE is in Cell_FACH state and the RNC sends RRC: PHYSICAL CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION message for transferring the UE to Cell_PCH or URA_PCH state. This does not include cases when the UE in Cell_PCH or URA_PCH state makes Cell Update or URA Update and only temporarily visits in Cell_FACH state.
